System overview: A smart HVAC platform manages temperature and air quality in a commercial building.
Objectives: keep rooms within target temperature and humidity, and minimize energy use.
Operating environment: offices with variable occupancy and seasonal temperature swings.
Actors: building manager, occupants, and maintenance staff.
Interfaces: BACnet network to sensors, dampers, and chillers; cloud dashboard for reports.
Assumptions: sensors are installed in all zones and building layout does not change weekly.
